thread.title: Surbhi Chandna-Karan Sharma Wedding: Couple Get A Warm Welcome At Chomu Palace - Watch
thread.title_full: Surbhi Chandna-Karan Sharma Wedding: Couple Get A Warm Welcome At Chomu Palace - Watch

author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: Surbhi Chandna-Karan Sharma Wedding: Couple Get A Warm Welcome At Chomu Palace - Watch
text:
Surbhi Chandna is all set to tie the knot with her longtime beau, Karan Sharma. The actress was recently seen enjoying a fun bachelorette with her girl gang, Shrenu Parikh, Mansi Srivastava, and others. The actress is all set to begin her marriage festivities.
Surbhi reaches Chomu Palace
Ahead of her marriage, Surbhi has now reached Jaipur, Rajasthan. The Ishqbaaz actress is set to get married at Chomu Palace.
The bride-to-be, Surbhi along with her fiance Karan, were spotted at her wedding location. The palace people gave the bride and groom's family and guests a warm welcome. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Telly Talk (@tellytalkindia)
\n In the video, Surbhi and Karan can be seen posing with the hotel authorities as they reach Chomu Palace. Let us remind our viewers that the wedding location is the same place where Akshay Kumar and Vidya Balan's Bhool Bhulaiyaa was filmed.
About Surbhi Chandna-Karan Sharma's love story
Talking about the couple's love story, Surbhi and Karan have been in a relationship for nearly 13 years. In September 2023, the much-loved couple had their roka ceremony.
Kick-starting the wedding functions, Surbhi and Karan will have their mehendi ceremony on Friday, March 1, 2024, followed by an engagement ceremony and a Sufi music night. On Saturday, March 2, 2024, Surbhi will have her haldi ceremony, which will have a Winter Wonderland theme.
The same morning, the actress will have her choora ceremony, following which the wedding will happen around 5 pm.
Talking about Surbhi the actress recently made her OTT debut with Barun Sobati's Rakshak, India's Brave Chapter 2. The audience is excited to see Surbhi act in the series.
